ygData.subject: RE: Weapons Selection - Fanged Skull Stiletto
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe the rumor is that they originally came from the 35+ underwater dungeon that you get to from dagnor s cauldron called Kedge Keep and that they have
ygData.messageBody:
I believe the rumor is that they originally came from the 35+ underwater
dungeon that you get to from dagnor's cauldron called "Kedge Keep" and that
they have since been removed from the game. I have also heard that they had
been given out as a reward in a GM-run event or quest on occasion.

I'm sure other's will clarify/verify my rumors...

- Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John.Curry@... [mailto:John.Curry@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 3:39 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Weapons Selection - Fanged Skull Stiletto
>
>
> From: John.Curry@...
>
> I have heared a lot of people talk about the sword of Ykesha and the
> Wakizashi (sp:) as being two of the best weapons that a bard
> can use. Well
> I was wondering about the Fanged Skull Stiletto which is DAM
> 12 Delay 22
> piercing and usable by Bards. It is apparently not a lore
> item so you could
> in theory get two of these and be a virtual quisinart. Does
> anyone own one?
> Know how to get one? I have heard that they come from
> somewhere in Dagnour
> Cauldron. Perhaps this item is so hard to get that it is not
> realistic to
> obtain untill really high levels. Info please :)
>
> Sevin Tercet 20th Human Bard
> on Brell
